description: The Kingston HyperX Fury RAM is designed for high-performance computing. With a capacity of 16GB and a speed of 3200MHz, it delivers fast and responsive multitasking. The CAS latency of CL16 ensures efficient data access. It's compatible with most modern desktops and operates at a low voltage of 1.2V for energy efficiency.

The Kingston ValueRAM is a reliable RAM module for laptops and compact systems. With 8GB capacity and a speed of 1600MHz, it provides sufficient memory for everyday tasks. The CAS latency of CL11 ensures responsive performance. It's a low-voltage module operating at 1.35V for power efficiency.

product_name: Kingston HyperX Predator RGB 32GB DDR4 RAM
description: The Kingston HyperX Predator RGB RAM delivers exceptional performance with 32GB of DDR4 memory in a 2 x 16GB configuration. It operates at a speedy 3600MHz, ensuring fast and responsive multitasking. With a CAS latency of CL17, it offers efficient data access. The RAM's RGB lighting adds a touch of style to your build. It's designed for high-performance systems and runs at a voltage of 1.35V.
